synopsis.text: Hikaru, Madoka, and Kyousuke find themselves in a tangled web of emotions as the star festival Tanabata draws near. Kyousuke, the perennial indecisive protagonist, is torn between inviting his crush, Madoka, or her best friend, Hikaru, who harbors feelings for him. His inability to make a choice leads to dire consequences, resulting in a tearful Hikaru and a hospitalized Kyousuke. As Kyousuke lies unconscious in his hospital bed, Madoka approaches him, leaving viewers on the edge of their seats. This special episode, released directly to video, is a compilation of the 13th and 14th episodes of the television series.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
